channel.title: RuneScape 459 Development (Hyperion/PJA)
channel.description:
Interested in beta testing RS 459? See page 5: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,524154.msg3844885.html#msg3844885 [center] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/6ci34g0i3/Untitled_4532.png[/img] [/center] [center] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=beKpnma8maw http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vmk1mSUXF7A http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NA3xCqSsc14 [i]Best viewed in 480p for better readability of the chat box. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w0sSzmy9WhM Short video showing a character reading book (new implement).[/i] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WANz4iqOZPU [i]Showing the usage of dialogue in Hyperion.[/i][/center] [b][size=12pt]About[/b] [b]Development stage: [s] preparation[/s] | [s]pre-alpha[/s] | alpha | beta | public beta | public host[/b] [i]Hello and welcome to my server development. I've decided to work on the #459 revision of Hyperion, Project Annihilation ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428517.0.html]found here[/url]). I haven't gone for a fancy name, I've simply chosen to call the server "RuneScape 459" for now. I do plan to change the name in the future however. Project Annihilation was a RuneScape remake, just about, and so I am going to keep to this setting, but I am NOT creating a RuneScape remake to be exact. This server already has an excellent combat system, NPC and player following clipping, skill implementation, barrows, pest control, fight caves and all the necessities for an exceptional server. I don't see this server being used very much, so the plan is to put it to good use and make the people that put it together proud. Also, if anyone would like help setting up/using this source feel free to contact me.[/i] [b][size=12pt]My Goal[/b] [ul][li][i]Solid economy[/li] [li][i]Diversity of items - implement ways of introducing never before seen items to wear/use (drops, rewards etc.).[/i][/li] [li][i]Low rate of experience (more than RS) with the occasional large reward (random events, milestones etc.) to keep the players hooked.[/li] [li][i]A Nostalgic essence of the "good old days".[/li] [li][i]Diversity regarding use of the map (common locations and dungeons for variation in training and drops).[/li] [li][i]Steady community. People who register for admin and claws will be sorely disappointed.[/li] [li][i]Keep it original. #459 data throughout.[/li] [li][i]No donator. Players are equal, and the server is free for all. If players want to come together to buy a dedicated host then that's for them to decide.[/li] [li][i]Create a Castle Wars base.[/li] [li][i]Common and uncommon features, programmed clean and to the best of my ability.[/li][/ul] [b][size=12pt]Progress Log[/b]
8th December 2011 -Prestige for levelling up has been reduced to + (level gained * 2). -First option bank booth now opens your bank. -Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock, Al-kharid, Draynor and Edgeville dungeon are now occupied by NPCs. -Player's must currently speak to Vannaka down Edgeville dungeon for a slayer task. -Implemented access to Canifis via speaking to Drezel, located between Varrock and Canifis, who then "takes you" to Canifis. -New locations populated with NPCs include: Afflicted (Mort'ma(sp?)) Rock slugs (Lumbridge spawmp caves) Zombies (Wilderness graveyard) Hill giants (Wilderness) Hill giants (Edgeville dungeon) Scorpions (Al-kharid mines) Hobgoblins (Level 30 Wilderness mines) Soldiers (Yanille) -Shantay bank has now opened for service. 5th December 2011 -Security book ("S" for Statistics) brings up the Player Statistics interface. -New random quotes for unhandled "Talk to" npcs. -Added a new class (ItemAction) that handles reading books etc. 2nd December 2011 -Added a Prestige Ranking system (based on damage dealt to entities, resources harvested, mini-games won, player kills etc.). -Added a Player Orientation system (based on good and evil. Players are awarded/deducted invisible "points" according to certain things they do, i.e. killing a man or a guard will help you on the way to an "Evil" orientation, whereas doing a good deed will help you to become a "Heroic" player etc.). -Implemented a basic Player Statistics system that keeps track of ores mines, logs cut, dragons slain, player kills, deaths etc. -Learnt about instance variables and creating new player save "tokens" for Hyperion. -Added some more ways to gain/lose Prestige (dying, dealing damage to an entity, woodcutting and mining). -Removed all npc spawns and started a new dump (by me personally). 28th November 2011 -Created a npc spawn dumper (::n NPCID, dumps in XML format to ./data/SpawnDump.txt) -Began a new class "Prestige". Player orientation and title ranking (still in development). 13th November 2011 -Downloaded Project Annihilation (Hyperion 459). -Created a system to check for a player's name and give them their playerRights (1 or 2) upon login. -Decided on a temporary name "RuneScape 459". -No more idle log out for the time being, easier for development (plan to add random events to players who are idle). -Created a new class "CoreSettings".
[b][size=12pt]Features[/b] [i]Features are a mix of what was already included in the source and new classes implemented by me.[/i] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/442/runecraftingo.png/][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/3319/runecraftingo.png[/img][/URL][b][size=12pt]Runecrafting[/b][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/442/runecraftingo.png/][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/3319/runecraftingo.png[/img][/URL] [b]Abyss:[/b] Zamorak mage: Skull at the Abyss: Manipulate blockages: Enter all Rifts: Bind essence at all temples: Essence pouches: Leave via all portals to mysterious ruins location [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/197/thievingd.png/][IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6998/thievingd.png[/img][/URL][b][color=purple][size=12pt]Thieving[/b][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/197/thievingd.png/][IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6998/thievingd.png[/img][/URL] [b]Pickpocketing:[/b] Men: Women: Farmers: H.A.M. members: Warrior women: Master farmer: Guard: Knight: Paladin: Hero: Elf [b]Stalls:[/b] Baker's stall: Tea stall: Crafting stall: Silk stall: Wine stall: Seed stall: Fur stall: Fish stall: Silver stall: Magic stall: Scimitar stall: Spice stall: Gem stall [b]Miscellaneous:[/b] Guards at Ardougne prevent you from stealing from a stall if they see you: Fail and successful pickpockets based on Thieving level [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/193/woodcuttingmw.png/][IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/1503/woodcuttingmw.png[/img][/URL][b][size=12pt][color=green]Woodcutting[/b][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/193/woodcuttingmw.png/][IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/1503/woodcuttingmw.png[/img][/URL] [b][color=green]Trees:[/b] Normal: Oak: Willow: Maple: Teak: Mahogany: Yew: Magic: [b][color=green]Axes:[/b] Bronze - level 1 - slowest speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Iron - level 1 - slow speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Steel - level 6 - slow/medium speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Black - level 6 - slow/medium speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Mithril - level 21 - medium speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Adamant - level 31 - good speed- higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Runite - level 41 - great speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate: Dragon - level 61 - best speed - higher Woodcutting level increases cut rate [b][color=green]Miscellaneous[/b] Random events: Normal tree has 1 log: Random amount of logs for trees: Realistic delays between each log: Tree felling (creates a stump once tree has no more logs): Higher tier trees are harder to cut: [b][size=12pt]Media[/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/36/95434798.gif/][IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/7773/95434798.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/339/lumbera.png/][IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/189/lumbera.png[/img][/URL] [i]Using the Abyss for Runecrafting.[/i] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/rc1xf.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/1848/rc1xf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/585/rc2k.png/][IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/5325/rc2k.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/337/rc3o.png/][IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/8540/rc3o.png[/img][/URL] [i]Basic Player Statistics interface, viewed by clicking the Security book ("S" for Statistics).[/i] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/vgj.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/9742/vgj.png[/img][/URL] [i]Keep track of resources through out your entire life time.[/i] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/822/orerecord.png/][IMG]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/9089/orerecord.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/827/logrecord.png/][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/8503/logrecord.png[/img][/URL] [i]Don't be seen stealing, otherwise you'll lose valuable Prestige.[/i] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/135/npcthievinglineofsight.png/][IMG]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/880/npcthievinglineofsight.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/844/npcclipping459.png/][IMG]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/6310/npcclipping459.png[/img][/URL]

item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:87, topic:421491"]Good luck my good Sir.

Ah, they are not exact to RuneScape… while Lumbridge, Varrock, Falador and Edge are… I have Fresh crawlers in the wilderness due to no Stronghold of security and Undead lumberjack’s in Canifis.

Still want it?

Edit: bah exceeds character limit and I’m off to bed now, will sort something out tomorrow.

just dump the maps[/quote]
You can’t do that anymore because of the clutter flutterer, correct? Or at least it would be very hard.

Read full topic
